snippet: A new book charts the decline of moderate Republicans, while another explores the Tea Party’s core beliefs about government.
abstract: Timothy Noah reviews books Rule and Ruin: The Downfall of Moderation and the Destruction of the Republican Party: From Eisenhower to the Tea Party by Geoffrey Kabaservice and The Tea Party and the Remaking of Republican Conservativism by Theda Skocpol and Vanessa Williamson.
lead_paragraph: A new book charts the decline of moderate Republicans, while another explores the Tea Party’s core beliefs about government.

headline.seo: Books About Conservatism and the Tea Party
headline.main: The Strange Death of the Republican Moderate
